org.apache.ignite.internal.binary

Interface BinaryRawWriterEx

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, BinaryRawWriter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BinaryWriterExImpl

    public interface BinaryRawWriterEx
extends BinaryRawWriter, AutoCloseable
    Extended writer interface.
